凾字的基本解释

凾
hán
古同“函”。

凾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hán］
［《廣韻》胡男切，平覃，匣。］
［《廣韻》胡讒切，平咸，匣。］
亦作“凾1”。亦作“圅1”。“椷2”的被通假字。亦作“肣1”。
(1)包含；容纳。
(2)铠甲。
(3)造甲的人。
(4)喻密布周围，形成保卫圈。
(5)匣子；封套。
(6)用匣子或封套装盛。
(7)书信。
(8)致函；去信。
(9)犹今之涵洞。
(10)函谷关的省称。

凾字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【凵字部】　凾； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页135第17
【韻會】函別作凾，非。

凾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
凾字的起名意思

暂无。

Sorrow
Basic explanation of words
Sorrow
hán
Gu Tong "letter".
Sorrow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [hán]
["Guangyun" Hu Nanqie, Pingtan, Xia. ]
["Guangyun" Hu slander cut, plain and salty, box. ]
Also known as "凾1". Also known as "圅1". The false word for "椷2" was passed. Also known as "肣1".
(1) Contain; contain.
(2) Armor.
(3) People who make armor.
(4) Yu densely spreads around, forming a defensive circle.
(5) Box; envelope.
(6) Use a box or a sealed suit to hold it.
(7) Letters.
(8) To write a letter; to write a letter.
(9) Culverts still present.
(10) The provincial name of Hangu Pass.
Sorrow

[Rhyme Club] Letters don’t make a fuss, nonsense.
